item.title: Video Editor for 2 Minute Corporate Sales Video - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced video editor to create a high-quality, corporate promo sales video for the company.  The video will be approximately 2 minutes long and will be used for email networking purposes. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in editing corporate and sales videos, with a knack for incorporating relevant B-roll footage to enhance the message.

Responsibilities:

Edit a 2-minute promotional video footage for CEO focusing on a professional and engaging style.
Incorporate relevant B-roll footage to support the video’s narrative and highlight key points.
Ensure the final video aligns with company branding and corporate identity.
Add appropriate background music, transitions, and effects to enhance the overall quality.
Collaborate with our team to understand the video’s objectives and target audience.
Make revisions based on feedback to ensure the final product meets our expectations.

item.title: Virtual Assistant / Video Editor (YouTube & Motion Graphics) - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Virtual Assistant / Video Editor

Location: Remote

Job Type: Part-Time / As Needed (around 2 days per week)

About Us:
We are a dynamic and forward-thinking company dedicated to producing high-quality content and providing exceptional services to our clients. As we continue to grow, we are seeking a talented Virtual Assistant / Video Editor to join our team. This role is perfect for a creative individual who is highly organized and proficient in video editing, with a passion for delivering top-notch work.

Job Description:
As a Virtual Assistant / Video Editor, you will be responsible for a variety of tasks that support our content creation and administrative needs. Your main responsibilities will include editing videos for our YouTube channel, social media platforms, and other marketing materials, as well as providing administrative and co-ordination support across the entire business to ensure smooth daily operations.

Key Responsibilities:
- **Video Editing**:
  - Edit and produce high-quality videos for YouTube, social media, and other platforms.
  - Add effects, graphics, music, and sound to enhance video quality.
  - Ensure all video content aligns with brand guidelines and messaging.
  - Stay up-to-date with industry trends and incorporate new techniques as appropriate.

- **Administrative Support**:
  - Manage and content creation activities.
  - Organise people as needed
  - Perform data entry, research, and compile information as needed.
  - Assist with project management and coordinate with other team members to ensure deadlines are met.

- **Social Media Branding & Management**:
  - Ensure social media channels are aligned and organised.
  - Assist in scheduling social media posts.

#### Qualifications:
- Proven experience as a Virtual Assistant or similar role.
- Proficient in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro preferred)
- Excellent organizational and time management skills.
- Strong written and verbal communication skills.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
- Creative mindset with attention to detail.
- Great graphic design skills are a plus.

#### Preferred Skills:
- Experience with motion graphics and animation.

We look forward to seeing how you can contribute to our team and help us create amazing content!


Hourly Range: $5.00

item.title: Video Editor for Speaker Reel - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a highly skilled and creative video editor with specific experience in creating speaker reels for professional speakers. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio demonstrating their expertise in selecting compelling segments from full-length keynotes or presentations and editing them into an engaging and impactful 3-minute reel.

Responsibilities:

Review two a full-length recorded keynote to understand the content and themes. (1 hour each)
Identify and select the most powerful and relevant segments that showcase speaking skills, audience engagement, and key messages.
Edit these segments into a cohesive and engaging 3-minute speaker reel.
Apply appropriate transitions, effects, and enhancements to ensure high production value.
Collaborate with me to review and revise the draft versions of the reel to ensure alignment with my vision and goals.
Deliver the final product in various file formats suitable for different platforms (e.g., YouTube, Vimeo, personal website).
Requirements:

Proven experience in video editing with a portfolio showcasing previous work, particularly speaker reels.
Strong storytelling abilities with an eye for detail and a knack for selecting impactful content.
Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar.
Excellent communication skills and responsiveness to feedback.
Ability to work within tight deadlines and provide timely updates.

Budget: $150

Category: Video Editing
